TEXT: The applicants , PERSON and PERSON , are NORP nationals who were born in DATE and DATE respectively and live in the village of GPE in GPE . The respondent Government were represented by Mr P. A. GPE , the representative of GPE at ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

On DATE the first applicant , PERSON , filed an action with ORG of GPE against a ORG - run enterprise , her employer , claiming unpaid salary and damages . Several hearings were held in DATE and DATE .
On DATE the court allowed the applicant 's claims in part .
On DATE the ORG quashed the judgment on the applicant 's appeal .
On DATE the ORG found for the applicant in part . The applicant did not appeal and the judgment came into force .

On DATE the second applicant , PERSON , an investigator , brought an action with ORG against the police , his employer , claiming his DATE salary , allegedly due to him for the period from DATE to DATE , and damages in this respect .
On DATE the court allowed the claims in part .
On DATE the ORG quashed the judgment on the applicant 's appeal and remitted the case to the first instance .
On DATE , as a result of a new examination of the case , the district court allowed the applicant 's claims in part .
On DATE the regional court quashed the judgment on the applicant 's appeal and remitted the case to the first instance .
On DATE the district court found for the applicant in part . On an unspecified date this judgment was upheld by the appeal court .

On DATE the applicant was dismissed . On DATE he filed an action with ORG against the police claiming reinstatement in his post of investigator and damages . According to the applicant , the case file was lost when being sent from the Chukotka ORG , which considered the applicant 's complaint , to the district court .
On DATE the district court received the applicant 's new action , which was identical to the first one .
On DATE the district court found for the applicant and ordered his reinstatement .
On DATE the regional court quashed the judgment on the defendant 's appeal and remitted the case to the first instance .
On DATE the case was transferred for examination to ORG of the Chukotka Region .
As of DATE the proceedings in the case were still pending .

Under LAW of DATE as well as LAW ( LAW ) , which came into force on DATE , the police investigator is responsible for the institution of criminal proceedings and investigation of crimes , and takes decisions during the investigation phase .
